audioText: Il mettait tous ses outils sur une grande bâche pour ne rien perdre.
question: What did he do with his tools?
options: He would put them all on a large tarp
He would lend them to his neighbor
explanation: The text states 'Il mettait tous ses outils sur une grande bâche pour ne rien perdre' - He used to put all his tools on a large tarp so as not to lose anything. The sentence uses 'mettait', the imparfait tense of 'mettre' (to put), describing a habitual action.
